title: Introduction to Web Development
details: What you will learn: Understand the technologies used in web development. Apply HTML document structure. Understand the HTML/CSS color model. Know the role of Javascript programming in web development. Create a basic Javascript program to collect data. Understand the next steps to learning professional web development skills.
